entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 21. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
